channel.title: wiki on Bonjour!
channel.description: Recent content in wiki on Bonjour!

item.title: JSPWiki 설치
item.author: clonekim-at-gmail-dot-com (DAEHEE KIM)
item.description: Apache JSPWiki 설정 server.xml <Connector address="127.0.0.1" port="8080" protocol="org.apache.coyote.http11.Http11NioProtocol" connectionTimeout="20000" maxThreads="3" minSpareThreads="2" redirectPort="8443" URIEncoding="UTF-8"/> jspwiki.properties jspwiki.baseURL= http://cloud9ine.cafe24.com/wiki jspwiki.fileSystemProvider.pageDir = /usr/local/apache-tomcat-7.0.42/jspwiki/ jspwiki.basicAttachmentProvider.storageDir = /usr/local/apache-tomcat-7.0.42/jspwiki/ jspwiki.policy Anonymous를 코멘트처리 Nginx 연동 upstream tomcat { server 127.0.0.1:8080; } server { ... location /wiki { proxy_pass http://tomcat; }
